About Me

Hello and welcome to my website!

I'm currently pursuing my bachelors in Computer Science at Ontario Tech University.

I'm a very passionate person in all that I do and am always looking towards building my knowledge of programming. I thoroughly enjoy programming in every aspect and, over the years, have completed many personal and work-related projects using a variety of tools.

From Java to Shell Scripting, there is nothing that I won't try!
